attributes.action: deny all illigal immigrant the rights to any help from any where to deter them from comming here
attributes.additional_details: to stop illigal immigrants comming here and playing the system oaps get treated worse than inmates assylum seekers get homed free education food tokens heating and utility bills paid for them well as a country we sustain this barrage of presure on our infrstucture hospitals cant cope scholsccant cope councils cant cope its time to stop it and stop it now
